程序包 com.example.springbootdemo.controller

类 RetailerInfoController

java.lang.Object
com.example.springbootdemo.controller.RetailerInfoController
@RestController @CrossOrigin @RequestMapping("/api/v1/retailer") public class RetailerInfoController extends Object
The RetailerInfoController class to handle the retailer request to log in and upload clothes
作者:
Zhikai Hu

  • 方法详细资料

    • login

      @PostMapping("/login") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Boolean> login(@RequestBody Map<String,String> loginInfo)
      The PostMapping to check if the retailer can successfully log in
      参数:
      loginInfo - the username and password mapping
      返回:
      boolean variable to indicate if the retailer can successfully log in

    • createAd

      @PostMapping("/upload_clothes") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Clothes> createAd(@RequestParam("file") org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile adsImages, @RequestParam("retailer_name") String retailer_name, @RequestParam("goodName") String name, @RequestParam("description") String description, @RequestParam("category") String category, @RequestParam("brand") String brand)
      The PostMapping to check if the retailer can successfully register
      参数:
      adsImages - the image of the clothes
      retailer_name - the name of the retailer
      name - the name of the clothes
      description - the description of the clothes
      category - the category of the clothes
      brand - the brand of the clothes
      返回:
      updated clothes
